title: Taming the Outlaw
description: I'm ready to reignite an old flame!"-- Cutter Reno, brazenly sexy rodeo champWhen rugged lone wolf Cutter Reno breezed back into Sundown, Montana, his macho male pride demanded he reclaim the one li'l lady who'd ever truly mattered. All it took was one intoxicating encounter with Peg Lathrop to intensify his desire to relive their moon-drenched summer nights from six years ago. However, the older and wiser single mom struggled to resist the tantalizingly tender caresses of this footloose cowboy who'd stolen her virginity -- and shattered her heart. Would it take a life-altering revelation to finally tame the outlaw and persuade him that happily-ever-after lies home on the range?Man of the Month
author: Cindy Gerard
